content.prompt: Which of the following describes a major change in international relations in the 1980s and 1990s?

choices.label: The rapid establishment of large overseas colonial empires by European powers
The disbanding of most regional political organizations
The decline in power of multinational corporations
The reduction of confrontations between communist and noncommunist countries

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
